member.name: HANDLE_CREATION_OPTIONS
member.summary: Represents the action to take depending on whether the file already exists.

member.name: HANDLE_CREATION_OPTIONS.HCO_CREATE_NEW
member.summary: Create a new file. The operation fails if the file already exists.

member.name: HANDLE_CREATION_OPTIONS.HCO_CREATE_ALWAYS
member.summary: Create a new file. If the file already exists, then it is truncated so that its size is zero bytes.

member.name: HANDLE_CREATION_OPTIONS.HCO_OPEN_EXISTING
member.summary: Open a file only if it exists. The operation fails if the file does not exist.

member.name: HANDLE_CREATION_OPTIONS.HCO_OPEN_ALWAYS
member.summary: Open a file, creating it if it does not already exist.

member.name: HANDLE_CREATION_OPTIONS.HCO_TRUNCATE_EXISTING
member.summary: Open a file and truncates it so that its size is zero bytes. The operation fails if the file does not exist.
